slides.description: Kudal, 2022: A year etched in our hearts. Remember the Konkan sun, the shared laughter, the promises whispered? Happy Anniversary, my love.
Two years and countless memories fueled by "her" - our second car together, a rolling testament to our 2022 journey.
Years melt away like colors in the spring rain. Another Holi, another memory painted on our hearts, a vibrant testament to our enduring love story.
Ten years ago, on Aksa's sands, we celebrated Aryan's birth. Waves of joy washed over us then, a feeling that still echoes in our hearts today.
